name: sluttish
content:
sluttish adjective
(SEXY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal disapproving looking like or relating to a person, especially a woman, who has a lot of sexual relationships without any emotional involvement: Don’t wear that, it makes you look sluttish.
More examplesFewer examplesShe claimed her husband made her wear slutty clothes even though the two were regular Church goers.Now it's considered as slutty if your jeans are really low. The plot focuses on a lonely, eccentric draughtsman who is bullied at work by his colleagues and lasciviously pursued at home by his sluttish landlady.I asked them to find me the sort of clothes they wear in Sex In The City, something classy and yet sluttish to suit my new image.
